description: This classic corn bread takes no time at all to whip up and is delicious served on its own or with stews, soups or salads.
keywords: Corn bread,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Egg,Peanut free
name: Classic Corn Bread Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 170Â°C. Butter a large round baking tin. Whisk the polenta, flour, bicarbonate of soda and chilli powder together in a large bowl.
Mix the eggs, milk and buttermilk in a jug. Add the wet mix into the dry and mix gently to combine. Pour the batter into the baking tin.
Bake 35-40 minutes until golden and firm.
